entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. POP 40%
